name: Mobile Twitter (Beta)
description:
**THIS IS IN REALLY EARLY STAGES**

Made this in about 10 minutes using the twitter main hex colours and bringing them to mobile.twitter.com.
There are a few problems:
- Mobile Twitter uses React.JS. Because of this, the element attributes might change by themselves.
- This was made within 10 mins, expect a ton of updates within the next few days/weeks.
